jparsec.astrophysics

Class IRAMPdBI

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.astrophysics.IRAMPdBI

  • public class IRAMPdBI
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to perform some useful calculations on IRAM instruments.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)

      • getFactorKToJy

        public static double getFactorKToJy(double lambda,
                    double bmajor,
                    double bminor)
        Returns the factor to transform from K to Jy in an image.
        Parameters:
        lambda - Wavelength in mm.
        bmajor - Major axis of the beam in arcseconds (major diameter of the beam).
        bminor - Minor axis of the beam in arcseconds (minor diameter of the beam).
        Returns:
        K to Jy transform coefficient.
